metadata.title: CVE-2017-18260 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr ERP/CRM is affected by multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities inversions through 7.0.0 via comm/propal/list.php (viewstatut parameter) orcomm/propal/list.php (propal_statut parameter, aka search_statutparameter).

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
